description: Children have to be prepared for a digital future, but their exposure to devices must depend on their age and readiness. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Children and their devices: How to strike the right balance
title_page: Children and their devices: How to strike the right balance | The Straits Times
maintext:
Our children’s future will be digital-rich and we must prepare them for it.
This was the shared consensus from delegates across 18 countries at the recent International Summit on the Teaching Profession held in Singapore. All delegates affirmed the importance of developing students’ digital skills and competencies.
